363770.name: Games of Glory - “Starter pack”
363770.description: The Games of Glory starter pack is the perfect way to get started playing! You get one playable Clone, Saga, an incredibly versatile scout with enormous mobility and her unique gas mask. On top of this you get $5 dollar worth of in-game currency, enough to buy additional Clones, hats or skins.
363770.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
